short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to host webinars and share and record your screen on www.orbstick.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you as a user on Orbstick.com to host webinars and to record and share your screen on www.orbstick.com and upload it to your videos. It also allows you to Share your desktop while you are connected with your friends and family.
